ratings.comment: His class is very easy. I like taking the quizzes and tests outside of class. His lectures are very very boring. The prep guides are long but easy, and they are a good resource to have when working on the quizzes. The text book is very accessible. An easy A but beware of long boring lectures.

Dr. Matt is a very fun professor with a grim but realistic sense of humor and he shows genuine fascination with the topics we cover in Psychology. If you prefer in-person quizzes, you might be out of luck, as all quizzes are taken outside of class, and you might miss them unless you work them into your schedule.
Lectures are actually nice to listen to because he makes them fun and relatable. No exams until the final, only 5 quizzes (do the practice questions makes it easier) and a project.
He really cares about students and is always willing to help. He is funny once you get used to his personality. For sure recommend taking him for any course.
Funny guy, makes the class enjoyable and much easier with his teaching style. Graded on a pretty steep curve though.
THE WORST TEACHER I'VE EVER HAD. WENT TO ALL OFFICE HOURS AND WHEN ASKED QUESTIONS HE SITS THERE, LAUGHS AT YOU AND LOOKS AT YOU LIKE YOU'RE STUPID. CLASS IS TOUGH AND HE DOESN'T MAKE IT ANY EASIER.

Incredible teacher. He makes statistics extremely easy, and goes through everything step-by-step so there is absolutely no confusion. He's eager to help, all you have to do is ask. Definitely take his class.
Had his last semester.  All his tests are from the notes, easy as hell.  Loved the guy.  Awesome guy and treats u as a person and not a subordinate.
hes not that hard but its graded on a tight curve so good grades dont come easily.  I got an 89 in the class and a BC overall.
Class is hard as expected.  Good teacher for Stats, especially since we use Excel.
